attributes.action: innocence man refused family visitor visa. Separating family
attributes.additional_details: Proof of partner pregnancy & support during his stay in UK was not enough to have a family visitor visa
attributes.background: My Civil partner was refuse entry to uk as he didn't have his own property or employed.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to make a specific change to the rules on family visitor visas.
